src:
Solskjaer: Bournemouth Bukan Lawan Enteng!
01 Nov 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer enggan melihat Bournemouth sebagai lawan yang mudah. Ia meyakini partai melawan The Cherries itu bakal menjadi laga yang sulit.
Manchester United akan melakoni laga tandang keempat beruntun mereka di akhir pekan ini. Mereka akan menantang Bournemouth di Vitality Stadium.
Tuan rumah sendiri tengah menjalani situasi yang kurang baik. Mereka belum meraih kemenangan di empat pertandingan terakhir mereka di ajang EPL.
Namun Solskjaer enggan lengah dengan tren yang kurang baik dari tuan rumah. "Saya rasa pertandingan nanti akan menjadi pertandingan yang sulit," ujar Solskjaer yang dikutip Manchester Evening News.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Solskjaer: Bournemouth is not an easy opponent!
Nov 01 2019, 19:40 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is reluctant to see Bournemouth as an easy opponent. He believes the party against the Cherries will be a difficult match.
Manchester United will play their fourth straight away match this weekend. They will challenge Bournemouth at the Vitality Stadium.
The host himself is undergoing a situation that is not good. They haven't won in their last four matches in the EPL event.
But Solskjaer was reluctant to let his guard down with unfavorable trends from the host. "I think the match will be a difficult match," Solskjaer was quoted as saying by the Manchester Evening News.

Read the trainer's full comment below.
